original_text: And when the blood of thy martyr Stephen was shed, I also was standing by, and consenting unto his death, and kept the raiment of them that slew him.
korean_text: 또 주의 증인 스데반이 피를 흘릴 때에 내가 곁에 서서 찬성하고 그 죽이는 사람들의 옷을 지킨 줄 그들도 아나이다

sentences.original_text: And when the blood of thy martyr Stephen was shed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 순교자 스티반의 피가 흘렸을 때

sentences.original_text: and kept the raiment of them that slew him
